verses.text:
Fade, fade, each earth-ly joy, Je-sus is mine! Break ev-'ry
Dark is the wil-der-ness, earth has no rest-ing place, Je-sus a-lone can bless, Je-sus is mine!

Fare-well, ye dreams of night, Je-sus is mine! Lost in this
tem-der, glo-rious light, sun-set at noon day bright, Je-sus is mine!
Fare-well, mor-tal-i-ty, Je-sus is mine! Wel-come, e-ter-ni-ty, Je-sus is mine!

chorus.text: Je-sus is mine! Je-sus is mine! Je-sus is mine!
